description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              * Responsibilities:
              
              - Self acquiring knowledge of the brand
              

              - Promoting luxury timepieces to customers
              

              - Managing customer relationships through excellent sales service
              

              - Creating and maintaining customers network
              

              - Attending and helping in corporate and customers’ events and activities
              

              - Supporting Marketing Department by translating/creating informative articles about the brands
              

              - Maintain boutique’s overall standard of maintenance, hygiene, cleanliness, service procedure and customer service
              

              *Benefits:
              
              - Trained by international brand managers
              

              - Competitive fixed salary (negotiable) plus commission and end of year bonus
              

              - Training trips and/or attending events abroad
              

              * How to apply:
              
              - Interested applicants apply by sending in your updated resume (.PDF or .DOCX) accompanied by a cover letter. Both should be in English.
              

              - Qualified applicants will be contacted for interviews including 3 rounds: English interview, interview with Operation/Brand Manager, with General Director.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Young dynamic, fresh graduates/senior students with independence, self-motivation, self-learn skill, sales oriented with passion in retail industry are welcomed.
              

              - Good to excellent command of English (equivalent to IELTS >6.5)
              

              - Willingness to learn and absorb new knowledge and experience
              

              - Decent looking, well mannered and postured person
              

              - Attitude of self improvement/progression is a plus
              

              - Graduate with fair to good records from leading universities (Foreign Trade University, Hanoi University, National Economics University...) (Optional)
              

              - Good team player
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
